name: A Dark Room (itch) (kevin866)
description:
In the room, you saw a mystery magic circle emitting red, sinister light. Bloodstains are around the magic circle, and sets of footprints of blood lead to nowhere.

A demo of a level design project using Unity HDRP. It is intended to create a sinister and mysterious atmosphere. 

The assets are from GameDevHQ FIlebase. 

Music by Setuniman: https://freesound.org/people/Setunima...

Concepts used in this project

• HDRP lighting(volumetric)

• Global illumination

•LIght probes

• Screenspace reflection  

• Occlusion culling

• Decal

• Cinemachine

• Timeline
